subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Scott Speed will race full time next season in Nascar’s Sprint Cup Series, a move anticipated since Red Bull Racing released A. J. Allmendinger to make room for Speed, a former Formula One driver. The team will change the Toyota to No. 82 from No. 84 to accommodate Speed, who has been training for Nascar since his release from Red Bull’s Formula One team in the summer of 2007. Jimmy Elledge will be his crew chief.
